extensionDescription.message: Fast navigation over next and previous pages of forums, search results, etc.

keyBindingChanged.message: Changes to key binding will only take effect in new windows or after restarting Firefox.

onlyLetterKeys.message: You can only use A-Z for this field.

PhraseAlreadyUsed.message: The text "$1" is already used for $2.

ImageAlreadyUsed.message: The image $1 is already used for $2.

removePhraseConfirmation.message: The text "$1" is used for $2. Remove it?

removeImageConfirmation.message: The image $1 is used for $2. Remove it?

replacePhraseConfirmation.message: The text "$1" is already used for $2. Use it for $3 instead?

replaceImageConfirmation.message: The image $1 is already used for $2. Use it for $3 instead?

enableNumberShortcuts.message: Enable |number shortcuts for navigating numbered links.

readingPreferencesFailed.message: There was a problem while reading preferences for NextPlease. They have been reset to default values. Go to Options dialog if you wish to change them.
readingPreferencesFailed.description: Message shown when reading options fails.

linkNotFound.description: Message shown when a link isn't found.
